headline: Raymond James Begins Coverage of NRG Energy (NRG) Stock, Gives Strong Buy
summary: NRG Energy, Inc. (NYSE:NRG) is one of the Top Energy and Utility Stocks Wall Street Analysts Are Talking About. On June 13, Raymond James began coverage of the company’s stock with a “Strong Buy” rating and price objective of $195. The analyst sees NRG Energy, Inc.
